Summary: looked at first like a satellite, but then curved more NW, speeded up then another joined it
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Belfair
There were no other sightings in Belfair on or around March 28th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi just stepped outside to look at the stars, since it's pretty night, with frogs singing, and noticed what i thought was a satellite moving north, which sped up and turned toward the northwest and while doing so, another point of light came in from the east, and then flew along with the first point of light to the w\nw while accelerating, and then disappearing in the distance. i've watched hundreds of satellites, and these were not satellites, because they don't speed up or turn or change direction. they were also too high and too fast to be conventional planes.
